item.title: Healing (Updated the code! Come check again!)
item.dc:creator: @Xx_R_A_G_3_R Xx R A G 3 R
item.description:
@Xx_R_A_G_3_R wrote:

Ok im working on making an item much like Holyforce heal the person using it. If som1 could just get me the download for this old time source where there was a heal on emote tab and it healed you i would love that, or if som1 could post the code to heal a person like the emote tab did i would also love that.

Here’s what i added and right now it deals random blue hits but does not heal

[code] case 2968:

if(hitDiff <= 99)
{
heal = 99;
hitDiff

-= +99;
hitDiff

-= +99;

updateRequired = true;

hitUpdateRequired = true;
sendMessage(“You are healed to full health.”);
setAnimation(718);
}
break;[/code]

Read full topic
